name: Abi Observer Agent
description: Monitors and analyzes agent interactions, system performance, and detects anomalies in real-time. Provides comprehensive observation reports and health metrics.

skills.name: System Health Monitoring
skills.description: Monitor overall system health and performance metrics across all agents.
examples: Monitor system performance and detect bottlenecks

skills.name: Anomaly Detection
skills.description: Detect unusual patterns, failures, and performance degradation in agent behavior.
examples: Detect repeated task failures or agent inactivity

skills.name: Event Stream Analysis
skills.description: Track and analyze events from agent interactions and task executions.
examples: Analyze task completion patterns and agent interactions

skills.name: Performance Analysis
skills.description: Analyze agent performance metrics and generate optimization recommendations.
examples: Generate performance reports and improvement suggestions

skills.name: Observation Reporting
skills.description: Generate comprehensive observation reports with insights and recommendations.
